QuerySetting.Select: ISNULL(w2_OrderItem.variation_id, '') AS variation_id, ISNULL(w2_Product.name, '') + CASE ISNULL(w2_ProductVariation.variation_name1, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE '(' END + ISNULL(w2_ProductVariation.variation_name1, '') + CASE ISNULL(w2_ProductVariation.variation_name2, '') WHEN '' THEN ISNULL(w2_ProductVariation.variation_name2,'') ELSE '-' + ISNULL(w2_ProductVariation.variation_name2,'') END + CASE ISNULL(w2_ProductVariation.variation_name1, '') WHEN '' THEN '' ELSE ')' END AS name, ISNULL(SUM(w2_OrderItem.item_quantity), 0) AS order_item_count
